value.title: Report: AI investments see largest year-over-year growth in 20 years
value.excerpt: Results indicate that COVID-19 has contributed to a surging global interest in AI from both governments and investors.

value.title: AutoML market revenue set to surpass $14 billion by 2030
value.excerpt: The automated machine learning (ML) market is expected to grow from $346.2 million in 2020 to $14.8 billion by 2030, based on forecasts from P&S Intelligence, Leading the market is a surge in demand for fraud detection solutions,

value.title: Amazon (AMZN) Expands Cloud Offerings With AWS Cloud WAN
value.excerpt: AWS unveils a service, namely AWS Cloud WAN, which aids in seamless development, management, operation and monitoring of a global network with the help of a central dashboard.

value.title: LogDNA raises $50M to bring ‘full power’ of observability data to security
value.excerpt: Observability data firm LogDNA, whose customers include IBM, said it's expanding into security with funding led by Dave DeWalt's NightDragon.

value.title: Open-Sourcing Human Rights Documentation In The Digital Age — Why Machine Learning Isn’t A Silver Bullet
value.excerpt: Increasingly, human rights violations are documented live on social media, only to be automatically erased for violating content moderation policies. Hadi al-Khatib, founder of Mnemonic, saves these audiovisual documents so they are available as evidence for lawyers and journalists.

value.title: For truly ethical AI, its research must be independent from big tech
value.excerpt: We must curb the power of Silicon Valley and protect those who speak up about the harms of AI

value.title: Argo AI Focuses On Cyclist Identification For Automated Vehicles
value.excerpt: Argo AI, the automated driving developer majority owned by Ford and Volkswagen has teamed up with the League of American Bicyclists to try to make roads safer for those on two wheels.

value.title: Most Latin companies using AI have profited from the technology
value.excerpt: But numbers in the region are still lower than other parts of the world; companies struggle with lack of trust in the technology and insufficient skills, according to research

value.title: Can a Tiny AI Group Stand Up to Google?
value.excerpt: Scientist Timnit Gebru has set up an AI research group one year after getting fired from Google, but she and others are fighting an uphill battle.

value.title: ‘As always’: Elon Musk tweets on recent Tesla hiring for AI engineers
value.excerpt: US-based electric vehicle company Tesla is hiring AI engineers who are passionate about solving day-to-day problems through artificial intelligence.

value.title: New approach to COVID-19 immune profiling using blood-based machine learning
value.excerpt: A new study discusses the application of a novel deconvolution model AImmune to predict moderate and severe cases of COVID-19.

value.title: NSW Transport and Cisco to run AI and IoT trials to ease congestion on public transport

value.title: Chinese researchers turn to artificial intelligence to build futuristic weapons
value.excerpt: Scientists say they have used the technology to build a pistol-sized coilgun that is the smallest and most powerful of its kind.

value.title: Sense raises $50M to bolster recruitment efforts with AI
value.excerpt: Sense, a startup developing AI-powered recruitment and hiring solutions for companies, has raised $50 million.

value.title: The Ironic Need To Make Sure That Self-Driving Cars Look Like Self-Driving Cars, At Least For The Time Being
value.excerpt: Self-driving cars might end-up looking like conventional cars, while conventional cars will look like self-driving cars, which could be troubling from a distinctive appearance consideration.

value.title: How To Generate & Submit Life Certificate Through Face Recognition?
value.excerpt: Every central government pensioner is mandated to submit a life certificate every year in November in order to keep their pension effective. Unfortunately, due to the COVID-19 outbreak, Central Government pensioners have been given an extended time limit until December to submit their life certificate online or in person at a bank.

value.title: Clearview AI set to get patent for controversial facial recognition tech
value.excerpt: The news comes as facial recognition systems are more and more widely adopted, despite a lack of clear rules regarding their use.

value.title: Interviews Of Eminent Female Leaders To Research The Impact Of COVID-19 On Women And How Policies And AI Can Help

value.title: Tesla pushes new Full Self-Driving Beta update with improved object detection
value.excerpt: Tesla has started to push a new Full Self-Driving Beta software update (version 10.6) to its fleet with improved object detection. It’s the latest step in the long road to improve the FSD package and deliver on a promise to customers that has been delayed several times.

value.title: Fears interviews done by robot AI 'stop clever working-class kids getting jobs'
value.excerpt: There are fears that robot interviews by webcam that judge candidates on the way they speak will stop well-qualified youngsters from less privileged families getting jobs
